articles.description: Anthony Davis exited L.A.'s loss after being struck on the side of the head by Golden State's Kevon Looney.
articles.content: SAN FRANCISCO -- Anthony Davis exited the Los Angeles Lakers' 121-106 Game 5 loss to the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday night midway through the fourth quarter and did not return after being inad… [+3616 chars]
